benchmark_details.name: Novel Benchmark for Evaluating LLMsâ€™ Ability to Learn User Preferences
benchmark_details.overview: This benchmark evaluates the ability of LLMs to learn user preferences in real-time, crucial for applications like personalized recommendations in planning scenarios.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate LLMs' capabilities in learning user preferences for planning tasks.

data.source: Constructed datasets for Travel Planning, Course Planning, and Fitness Planning tasks.
data.size: Variable sizes depending on task difficulty.
data.annotation: Feedback from users after executing plans and iterative enhancement based on user satisfaction.

methodology.calculation: Performance calculated based on the number of satisfied constraints and user feedback scores over several iterations.
methodology.interpretation: A better performance indicates a more effective learning of user preferences and constraints adherence.
methodology.validation: Performance validated through comparison against ground truth solutions and user satisfaction assessments.
